'GIVERS' are an indie pop group from Lafayette, Louisiana. The band is made up
of vocalist and percussionist Tiffany Lamson, vocalist and guitarist Taylor
Guarisco, drummer and vocalist Kirby Campbell, bassist and guitarist Josh
LeBlanc, and flautist, saxophonist, and keyboardist Nick Stephan. [http://g-
lassnote.ning.com/profile/GIVERS?xg_source=profiles_memberList "GIVERS"].
Glassnote Music. February 2011
